Question: Shenzhen Lepower Electronic Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Lepower Electronic Co., Ltd.

Product: LED lighting solutions

- Specializes in road, sport, industrial, and tunnel lighting
- Projects include LED stadium light with Lora Control Smart Football Court lighting and L16 LORA Control LED Street Light Project
- Featured in international exhibitions showcasing LED street lights, stadium lights, and industrial high bay lights
- Offers high-quality optical control for accurate color display and energy-efficient lighting solutions
- Provides lighting products with advanced technologies such as DMX 512 control system and LORA control
- Offers a wide range of LED lighting products and technologies with a focus on energy efficiency and environmental conservation

For more information, visit www.lepowerled.com
